import CustomerDetails from "./CustomerDetails"; import ShippingAddressDetails from "./ShippingAddressDetails"; export default function CustomerProfile() { let profile; let loading; let error; let orders = []; return ( <>
{loading ? (

Loading...

) : error ? (

{error}

) : orders?.length <= 0 ? (

No Order Found

) : ( orders?.map((order) => { return ( <>
Order number
{order?.orderNumber}
Date placed
{new Date(order?.createdAt).toDateString()}
Total amount
${order?.totalPrice}

Status:{" "} {order?.status}

{/* payment method */}
Payment Method
{order?.paymentMethod}
{/* Products */}

Products purchased

{order?.orderItems?.map((product) => (

{product.name}

${product.discountedPrice}

{product.description}

{/* payment status icon */}

Payment Status: {order.paymentStatus}

))}
{/* shipping address */} ); }) )} ); }
